New Records: Vangelis Pavlidis scored a brace to make history for Greece against England
Key Match Events: Jude Bellingham equalized for England in the 87th minute
Vangelis Pavlidis scored the winner in the 4th minute of stoppage time
Giorgos Masouras and Pavlidis had goals ruled out for Greece
Pre-Game Insights: England started with an ultra-attacking line-up but misfired badly
Greece held a minute's silence before kickoff for their former international George Baldock who died this week
Post-Match Reflections: Lee Carsley, England's interim manager, said he's hopeful he can return as U21s coach if he's not offered a permanent job with the men's team
John Stones, England's captain, said they prepared like they normally do but it didn't come off
Vangelis Pavlidis said it was a very special day and match for Greece and they gave their soul for George Baldock tonight
Miscellaneous Highlights: Greece beat England for the first time
Greece top the table with a maximum nine points while England's first defeat under Carsley left them second with six
